title: Heart-stopping video shows moment man is lifted and pinned against wall by bull

A horrifying video shows the moment a man was repeatedly attacked and pinned to a wall by a bull.

The villager was attending the 'bous al carrer' - a bull-running event- in Borboto, a town in Valencia, eastern Spain.

Video emerged showing the black bull rampaging down the street when a few locals try to run past the beast.

A young man in blue top manages to escape as he sprints to safety to the corner.

However, the second man, who is seen wearing a white top and black pants, falls to the ground when the bull charges at him.

(Image: CEN/@juanatonioluqe)

(Image: CEN/@juanatonioluqe)

The powerful animal pushes him towards a wall and lifts him midair as shocked festival-goers watch on.

A woman can be seen calling for help while another man takes off his shirt and waves it in a bid to draw the bull's attention.

It is said they managed to distract the bull with a red flag.

Local reports said the man, named Paco PR, is from Manises in the Valencia region.

(Image: CEN/@juanatonioluqe)

(Image: CEN/@juanatonioluqe)

He was taken to hospital with at least six horn-inflicted wounds.

According to the event organiser, Paco was not in a life-threatening situation and is recovering from his injuries.

They added that he is a regular participant at the bull running event.
description: The man was knocked to the ground and pushed to the wall by the ferocious bull during the local bull-running event in Valencia, eastern Spain
